name: Shadow's Kiss Online Vampire RPG
description:
Welcome friends, fellow creatures of the night...

Enter a world of gothic vampires, steampunk hunters, technological necromancers, Victorian ghosts, and the unquiet dead. Shadow’s Kiss is an online vampire roleplaying game, set in the fictional city of San Cipriano, where the player is cast as a fledgling vampire learning to survive in her new world of ruthless monsters and intrigue.

Shadow’s Kiss offers many of the classic features of an open world RPG, including:
  • Robust quest system.
  • “Classless” advancement system where you train skills offline and purchase powers to define your character.
  • Immersive and gritty narrative system built off of four different archetypes: Sinister Mastermind, Diabolic Monster, Fallen Angel, or Gritty Antihero.
  • Exploration for hidden treasures and lore.

Gameplay in Shadow’s Kiss also innovates in interesting ways:
  • Intimidation, alliance, and diplomacy system where you can advance without resorting to combat.
  • Turn-based combat that allows for surprises, traps, and interesting narratives. No need for Jedi-like reflexes to be a terrifying vampire!
  • Seduction and other mature content.
  • Raising drained mortals as your vampire thralls.
  • Necromancy system to force the walking dead to serve you!
